expectedFields.Tipo: Single select - Call, Email, Meeting, Task, etc.
expectedFields.Stato: Single select - Programmata, In corso, Completata, Annullata
expectedFields.Priorit√†: Single select - Bassa, Media, Alta, Urgente
expectedFields.Data creazione: Date field - When activity was created
expectedFields.Lead: Link to table - Array of lead IDs (recXXXXXXXXXXXXXX)
expectedFields.Nome Lead: Lookup field - Lead names from linked records
expectedFields.Assegnatario: Link to table - Array of user IDs
expectedFields.Nome Assegnatario: Lookup field - User names from linked records
expectedFields.Esito: Single select - Positivo, Negativo, Da ricontattare, etc.
expectedFields.Note: Long text - Free form notes about the activity
expectedFields.Prossimi step: Long text - Next actions to take
expectedFields.Data prossimo follow-up: Date field - When to follow up next
expectedFields.Allegati: Attachment field - Files related to activity

notes: This analysis is based on the pattern observed in leads table
Activity IDs found in leads suggest a fully configured Activity table exists
Field types inferred from common CRM patterns and existing project structure
